archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Data Management [DATM]
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation: The management of practices and processes to ensure the security, quality, integrity, safety and availability of all forms of data and data structures that make up the organisationâ€™s information. The management of data and information in all its forms and the analysis of information structure (including logical analysis of taxonomies, data and metadata). The development of innovative ways of managing the information assets of the organisation.
